808720.name: Octogeddon - Soundtrack
808720.description:
The complete original soundtrack to Octogeddon!

Music provided in MP3 and lossless FLAC format with full tagging. An "Octogeddon Soundtrack" folder will be downloaded with lossless FLAC format option available.

Total runtime - 58:22

Update For September 1 2023:
If you previously tried purchasing and downloading the Octogeddon Soundtrack and had problems with it, the problems should be fixed now. We apologize for the inconvenience.
808720.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
